author: Anna Iovine
title: Watch Zac Efron cry and be incredibly charming on 'Hot Ones'
description: We're in an unprecedented time in the world, one where we're all stuck at home and have the inclination to refresh Twitter and watch news unfold all day. It's left us anxious, confused, and with more eye strain than ever before. Thankfully, Sean Evans and Hot…
content:
